titleStmt.title: A speech of VVilliam Thomas, esquire Ianurary, 1641 concerning the right of Bishops sitting and voting in Parliament : wherein hee humbly delivereth his opinion that their sitting and voting there is not onely inconvenient and unlawfull
titleStmt.author: Thomas, William, Sir, d. 1653?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
